channel.title: Other operating systems
channel.description: Some time ago I was setting up Xubuntu as Whonix Workstation, and in documentation, section https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Other_Operating_Systems and https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Ubuntu_Tips and https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Ubuntu_Tips#Guest_additions_for_Ubuntu I didn't found anything that could help me to set up latest Xubuntu 22.04 to work with Whonix Gateway. So I set t up by myself and described my steps here: https://0ut3r.space/2022/05/05/xubuntu-whonix/ Maybe it could be useful for other Whonix users setting up own workstation. Fell free to update Ubuntu section in documentation on wiki as my Xubuntu instructions will also work with Ubuntu.

item.title: Other operating systems
item.dc:creator: hoek
item.description:
Some time ago I was setting up Xubuntu as Whonix Workstation, and in documentation, section Other Operating Systems - Whonix and Ubuntu Tips - Whonix and Ubuntu Tips - Whonix
I didnâ€™t found anything that could help me to set up latest Xubuntu 22.04 to work with Whonix Gateway.
So I set t up by myself and described my steps here: Xubuntu as custom Whonix workstation
Maybe it could be useful for other Whonix users setting up own workstation. Fell free to update Ubuntu section in documentation on wiki as my Xubuntu instructions will also work with Ubuntu.
